title: Elon Musk says Twitter will offer the ability to attach long-form text to tweets, creator monetization for all forms of content, and better search (Elon Musk/@elonmusk)
description:
Elon Musk / @elonmusk:
Elon Musk says Twitter will offer the ability to attach long-form text to tweets, creator monetization for all forms of content, and better search  —  Twitter will soon add ability to attach long-form text to tweets, ending absurdity of notepad screenshots
